parameter.name: shortenTimer
parameter.label: ShortenTimer
parameter.help: Shorts timer by random 50%-80%. By default 5-7min front timer with shortened timer enabled due to recent changes of having autobuild and such to get rid of long wait times

parameter.name: cameraName
parameter.label: Camera Name
parameter.help: Name of the camera to be referenced in LUA.

parameter.name: fov
parameter.label: FOV
parameter.help: Field of view of the camera, in degrees. 90 is normal.

parameter.name: targetName
parameter.label: Target Name
parameter.help: Name this position will be referred to as in LUA.

parameter.name: distance
parameter.label: Move Distance
parameter.help: How far the sg_func_door will move.

parameter.name: speed
parameter.label: Move Speed
parameter.help: How fast the sg_func_door will move.

parameter.name: direction
parameter.label: Direction
parameter.help: Direction the movable will move after closing (place it in the map at its closed position). If you choose waypoint you have to place one func_train_waypoint and name it like the moveable.

parameter.name: protection
parameter.label: Protection Radius
parameter.help: Reserved for further use.

parameter.name: emitMessage
parameter.label: Emit message
parameter.help: The listening entity must respond to this message.

parameter.name: name
parameter.label: Name
parameter.help: Name of maid trigger which can be referenced by other entities.

parameter.name: type
parameter.label: TimerType
parameter.help: The func_maid will stop killing entering entities when selected timer expires.

parameter.name: listenMessage
parameter.label: Kill on message
parameter.help: Will kill all live entities when message is received.

class.name: ambient_sound
class.help: Plays sound for a local player when entering specifies radius.

parameter.name: eventName
parameter.label: FMOD event name
parameter.help: Sound to play when player enters radius.

parameter.name: radius
parameter.label: Trigger radius
parameter.help: Players entering this sphere will have sound triggered for them.

parameter.name: minFalloff
parameter.label: Minimum falloff
parameter.help: Sound is played at full volume within this distance.

parameter.name: maxFalloff
parameter.label: Maximum falloff
parameter.help: Sound is decreased to inaudible at this distance (using linear or logarithmic falloff).

choice.label: Logarithmic
choice.help: minFalloff is where sound starts to attenuate from. maxFalloff is ignored. More realistic, not very game-friendly.

choice.label: Linear
choice.help: Sound is full volume at minFalloff and becomes inaudible at maxFalloff.

choice.label: Custom
choice.help: Sound uses custom falloff (defined in FMOD).

parameter.name: offOnExit
parameter.label: Turns off when player leaves radius

class.name: ambient_sound_player
class.help: This signal listener will start nearby ambient_sounds when it receives the startsOnMessage.

parameter.name: startsOnMessage
parameter.label: Trigger message
parameter.help: Nearby ambient_sound entities will play when this message is received

parameter.name: nearbyDistance
parameter.label: Trigger distance
parameter.help: This entitity will search for ambient sounds within this distance.

parameter.name: commAlpha
parameter.label: Commander Alpha
parameter.help: 0-1. Doesn't collide if less than 1.

parameter.name: pathInclude
parameter.label: Pathing Include
parameter.help: On will include in NavMesh. Off excludes prop from nav mesh

parameter.name: pathWalkable
parameter.label: Pathing Walkable
parameter.help: On will be walkable in NavMesh. Off makes prop not walkable in nav mesh

parameter.name: collidable
parameter.label: Collidable
parameter.help: The prop can be collided with

parameter.name: emissivePower
parameter.label: Emissive matches power
parameter.help: Matches emissiveness with the room power.

parameter.name: distance
parameter.label: Max Distance
parameter.help: Maximum distance the reflection probe will affect the scene

parameter.name: strength
parameter.label: Strength
parameter.help: Intensity of the reflections. Recommended to be less than 0.5

parameter.name: gobo_texture
parameter.label: Gobo Texture
parameter.help: Texture map that is projected from the light.

parameter.name: onlyexplore
parameter.label: Only Explore
parameter.help: Only create this entity during explore/training mode

parameter.name: onlyexplore
parameter.label: Only Explore
parameter.help: Only create this entity during explore/training mode

parameter.name: arcFactory
parameter.label: ARC robotics factory
parameter.help: Start with ARC robotics factory upgrade

parameter.name: onlyexplore
parameter.label: Only Explore
parameter.help: Only create this entity during explore/training mode

class.name: reverb
class.help: FMOD Reverb object. Place it to adjust the audio reverb qualities nearby. References reverb settings from FMOD Designer.

parameter.name: minRadius
parameter.label: Min Radius
parameter.help: At this distance from the point, the reverb settings are fully heard.

parameter.name: maxRadius
parameter.label: Max Radius
parameter.help: At this distance from the point, the reverb settings are no longer heard.

parameter.name: signalRange
parameter.label: Emit radius
parameter.help: This is the maximum distance the signal will reach.

parameter.name: listenChannel
parameter.label: Listen channel
parameter.help: Messages not on this channel will be ignored.

parameter.name: emitTime
parameter.label: Emit time
parameter.help: Time in seconds until signal will be emitted.

parameter.name: emitOnce
parameter.label: Emit only once
parameter.help: Signal will continue to emit at the rate defined by time when false.

parameter.name: emitChannel
parameter.label: Emit channel
parameter.help: Only entities listening on this channel will receive the message.

parameter.name: emitMessage
parameter.label: Emit message
parameter.help: The listening entity must respond to this message.

parameter.name: emitChannel
parameter.label: Emit channel
parameter.help: Only entities listening on this channel will receive the message.

parameter.name: emitMessage
parameter.label: Emit message
parameter.help: The listening entity must respond to this message.

parameter.name: coolDownTime
parameter.label: Cooldown time
parameter.help: The amount of seconds to wait after the button is pressed until it can be pressed again.

parameter.name: name
parameter.label: Name
parameter.help: Name of trigger which can be referenced by other entities

parameter.name: tooltip
parameter.label: Tooltip
parameter.help: Displays a tooltip to the player when looking at it, active only in explore/training mode.

parameter.name: useLegacyOverview
parameter.label: Legacy Overview Image
parameter.help: Maps blips (entity icons) in-game to the minimap using old, incorrect technique that matches up with pre-320 generated overview images.

parameter.name: name
parameter.label: Name
parameter.help: Name of trigger which can be referenced by other entities

class.name: location
class.help: Enter name location which is shown to players

parameter.name: showOnMinimap
parameter.label: Show On Minimap
parameter.help: Show location on minimap

parameter.name: name
parameter.label: Name
parameter.help: Name of trigger which can be referenced by other entities

parameter.name: enabled
parameter.label: Trigger enabled
parameter.help: Will not kill when disabled.

parameter.name: damageOverTime
parameter.label: Damage over time
parameter.help: If set to any value greater than 0, this amount of damage will be applied per second.

parameter.name: teamType
parameter.label: Team to damage
parameter.help: Determines what team can take damage in this trigger

parameter.name: name
parameter.label: Name
parameter.help: Name of trigger which can be referenced by other entities

parameter.name: teleportDestinationId
parameter.label: Teleport Destination ID
parameter.help: Place a teleport_destination entity with the same ID used.

parameter.name: teleportDestinationId
parameter.label: Teleport Destination ID
parameter.help: Use same ID used for teleport_trigger to connect them.

parameter.name: scale
parameter.label: Scale
parameter.help: Size of Infantry Portal attach range to command station

parameter.name: scale
parameter.label: Scale
parameter.help: Size of ARC range circle

parameter.name: scale
parameter.label: Scale
parameter.help: Size of max relevancy range circle

parameter.name: scale
parameter.label: Scale
parameter.help: Size of egg auto spawn range from a hive

class.name: sound_effect
class.help: This sound effect can be used to play sounds based on messages received from other entities in the map.

parameter.name: eventName
parameter.label: FMOD event name
parameter.help: Sound to play.

parameter.name: startsOnMessage
parameter.label: The sound effect will play when this message is received

parameter.name: chooseWeight
parameter.label: Spawn weight
parameter.help: Weight should be greater than 0, the higher the weight, the more likely this point will be chosen

parameter.name: extendAmount
parameter.label: Arm extension
parameter.help: This controls how long the Hive arms are. The value must be between 0 and 1.

parameter.name: alienSpawn
parameter.label: Alien spawn location
parameter.help: This is the location where the Alien team will spawn in this configuration.

parameter.name: marineSpawn
parameter.label: Marine spawn location
parameter.help: This is the location where the Marine team will spawn in this configuration.

parameter.name: weldTime
parameter.label: Weld time
parameter.help: Weld time in seconds

parameter.name: weldHealth
parameter.label: Weld health
parameter.help: Health to destroy after welded (1 to 2000)

parameter.name: clean
parameter.label: Use clean version
parameter.help: Uses the alternate clean version of the door model

class.name: power_point
class.help: Place in location entity to affect structures and lights there

parameter.name: cinematicName
parameter.label: Cinematic file
parameter.help: Name of cinematic file (created with Cinematic Editor)

parameter.name: commanderInvisible
parameter.label: Commander Invisible
parameter.help: This cinematic will not be displayed for commanders if this value is true.

class.name: cinematic
class.help: Adds a cinematic entity to the game world.

parameter.name: startsOnMessage
parameter.label: Play on message
parameter.help: The cinematic effect will play when this message is received

class.name: sound_effect
class.help: This sound effect can be used to play sounds based on messages received from other entities in the map.

parameter.name: eventName
parameter.label: FMOD event name
parameter.help: Sound to play.

parameter.name: startsOnMessage
parameter.label: Play on message
parameter.help: The sound effect will play when this message is received

parameter.name: scale
parameter.label: Scale
parameter.help: Does not currently work

parameter.name: commAlpha
parameter.label: Commander Alpha
parameter.help: 0-1. Doesn't collide if less than 1.

parameter.name: dynamic
parameter.label: Dynamic
parameter.help: Specifies whether bones are driven by physics simulation (synced with server) or physics model is updated by animation

parameter.name: pathInclude
parameter.label: Pathing Include
parameter.help: On will include in NavMesh. Off excludes prop from nav mesh

parameter.name: pathWalkable
parameter.label: Pathing Walkable
parameter.help: On will be walkable in NavMesh. Off makes prop not walkable in nav mesh

parameter.name: collidable
parameter.label: Collidable
parameter.help: The prop can be collided with

parameter.name: emitChannel
parameter.label: Tag emit channel
parameter.help: All animation tags will be emitted as a signal on this channel.

parameter.name: listenMessage
parameter.label: Animate on message
parameter.help: Will activate when this message is received.

parameter.name: inputName
parameter.label: Input name
parameter.help: Name of the animation input to affect.

parameter.name: inputValue
parameter.label: Input Value
parameter.help: Input name will be set to this value.

parameter.name: range
parameter.label: Search radius
parameter.help: Only prop_dynamics within this range will be affected.

class.name: skybox

parameter.name: cinematicName
parameter.label: Cinematic file
parameter.help: Name of cinematic file (created with Cinematic Editor)

class.help: Creates a skybox cinematic that's always centered around the viewer.

parameter.name: deathSoundName
parameter.label: Kill sound
parameter.help: Sound to play when killed.

parameter.name: spawnAnimation
parameter.label: Spawn animation
parameter.help: Animation played when target is first spawned.

parameter.name: popupAnimation
parameter.label: Popup animation
parameter.help: Animation played when player is nearby.

parameter.name: popupSoundName
parameter.label: Popup sound
parameter.help: Sound to play when target pops up.

parameter.name: popupRadius
parameter.label: Popup radius
parameter.help: Target plays popup animation when any player comes within this range.

class.name: fog_controls
class.help: Allows tuning of fog values for different rendering zones.

class.name: fog_area_modifier

parameter.name: start_blend_radius
parameter.label: Distance to start blending into these fog settings

parameter.name: end_blend_radius
parameter.label: Distance to finish blending into these fog settings

class.help: Allows tuning of fog values for areas of the world.

class.name: pathing_settings
class.help: Allows tuning of pathing settings to help optimize pathing
